page.title: 17THE FLIGHT OF THE DRAGONS
page.content: This story tells of a day in September 1449, when the people of Little Cornard were alarmed by a rumbling noise coming from the meadows next to the River Stour.They nervously crept towards the river and were amazed to see, by the curve of the meadows, a huge beast red and spotted with dark eyes with a long spiny tail.In an opposite corner of the meadows stood another beast, all shiny black, with an enormous flabby body .The two beasts fought each other fiercely for over an hour and then each stopped .The red one went towards Essex and the black one stayed in Suffolk.
